meanings.definition: The subject of a piece of writing, speech, artwork, etc.
meanings.sent1: The theme of the story was friendship.
meanings.sent2: The author explored the theme of love in her novel.
meanings.sent3: The theme of the play was so clear, even the youngest audience member understood.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the theme of nature was depicted with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The theme of courage shone brightly throughout the book.

meanings.definition: A recurring idea or motif in a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The theme of nature appeared in every chapter of the book.
meanings.sent2: The movie's theme of redemption left a lasting impact on the viewers.
meanings.sent3: The theme of cats wearing hats made the children giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a theme of elegance and grace at the ball.
meanings.sent5: The theme of perseverance echoed through the poem, inspiring all who read it.
